Articles.Content:
if some1 can help me iv been having some issues trying to find a mod that makes both the SPH and VAB bigger, i had it book marked but because of what happened to the forums of corse that doesnt work and i cant seem to find it on the space port either.

if you can find the/a mod for this a link would be great.

thanks in advance:

zombie
The forum got partially eaten, so you are going to have to wait in the Mod and Plugin showcase subforum.

there is this, but I don't know if that is what you were looking for.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/launchpadobliterator/
I think you mean DEADB33F's Editor Tools.
Wow, edtools seems to be pretty sweet. How do I enable mirror mode in VAB?
It should be in the readme in the archive. If not, I dunno, the thread with all the discussion died.
Unfortunately the readme only has a hotkey mention for vertical snap (which is useful in and of itself) and it mentions the mirror mode, but not how to do it.
the Tab key switches between the two modes.
Thank you kind sir. Now I can design rovers on my rockets :-)
